TMR_ISO180006B_LockAction Struct Reference

#include <tmr_iso180006b.h>

List of all members.

Public Attributes

uint8_t address

Detailed Description

The arguments to a TMR_lockTag() method for ISO18000-6B tags. Represents the byte to be locked.

Member Data Documentation

uint8_t TMR_ISO180006B_LockAction::address

The memory address of the byte to lock
